import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update a web plugin"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/webplugins/{name}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates a web plugin with the parameters specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"name","in":"path","description":"The web plugin name.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","example":"Winfield Upton"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The configuration settings for the web plugin instance.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"enabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Controls whether the web plugin is active and operational.","example":true},"settings":{"maxLength":255,"minLength":0,"type":"string","description":"The JSON-formatted configuration settings for the web plugin.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The configuration settings for the web plugin instance.","title":"WebPluginRequests"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Ok"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Plugins disabled"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
